name: OCKWeekCalendarView
desc: A view that displays a horizontal row of seven, selectable completion rings with labels.

items.name: init(weekOfDate: Date)
items.desc: Creates a view with seven, interactive completion rings, each corresponding to a day of the week.

items.name: var delegate: OCKCalendarViewDelegate?
items.desc: An object that receives callbacks for changes in a calendar view.

items.name: var completionRingButtons: [OCKCompletionRingButton]
items.desc: The completion ring buttons in the view.

items.name: func completionRingFor(date: Date) -> OCKCompletionRingButton?
items.desc: Returns the completion ring that corresponds to a specific date.

items.name: var selectedDate: Date { get }
items.desc: The date currently selected in the calendar.

items.name: var dateInterval: DateInterval { get }
items.desc: The date interval for the week the calendar is displaying.

items.name: func selectDate(Date)
items.desc: Selects the completion ring that corresponds to the given date.

items.name: func showDate(Date)
items.desc: Displays the week for a specific date.
